name: Rogue Dungeons
description:
Grab your gun and go into rogue-like dungeons!

Fight with monsters and bosses! Buy new weapons! Find artifacts!

But be fast, because The Darkness is following you... And if you die, you will start over

Your ammo are not infinite, when you shoot, Mana™ will drain, but you can recover it by killing enemies.

---PUBLIC BETA INFO---

Game currently contain:

4 floors (2 types)

3 Artifacts

4 Guns

1 Boss

Please write your suggestions in discussion board
